Key Match Events: Iran's M. Ghayedi scored the only goal of the match in the 25th minute
HKG's C. Wu received a yellow card in the 38th minute
HKG's V. Núñez received a yellow card in the 48th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Iran's win keeps them at the top of Group C with 9 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the AFC Asian Cup 2024
Iran's M. Ghayedi was substituted out in the 66th minute
HKG's C. Wu was substituted out in the 90th minute
Others: The match was played at the Khalifa International Stadium in Hong Kong, China
The match started at 5:30 PM on January 19th, 2024
